other_tests.findings: Hypocellular condition without dysplastic changes; increased activated phagocytes. Suggested hemophagocytic syndrome (HPS).
Detected viral RNA for both genes (4.6 × 10^2 copies/µg RNA for U60/66 and 5.2 × 10^3 copies/µg RNA for IE1).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Negative status achieved with the patient’s immunological recovery.

other_tests.findings: Detected IE antigens in a bone marrow sample.
HHV-6A isolated from the patient’s PBMCs.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resumption of antiviral treatment improved the patient's HPS; HHV-6A DNA and RNA titers increased during complications but later reduced.
